title: Browser Certificate Errors
description: Troubleshooting 'Connection Not Secure' and SSL certificate errors.

steps.title: Check System Time
steps.instruction: Incorrect system date/time is the #1 cause of certificate errors. Ensure your computer's clock is correct.

steps.title: Clear SSL State
steps.instruction: In Windows, search for 'Internet Options', go to 'Content' tab, and click 'Clear SSL State'.

steps.title: Try Incognito/Private Mode
steps.instruction: Open the site in Incognito mode. If it works, clear your browser cache and cookies.

steps.title: Update Browser
steps.instruction: Ensure your browser (Chrome/Edge) is updated to the latest version via Settings > Help > About.

steps.title: Ticket Preparation
steps.instruction: If the error persists on internal company sites, raise a ticket with the URL and a screenshot of the error code (e.g., ERR_CERT_DATE_INVALID).
